mapper.select: select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.views, b.update_time,b.description, t.name typename,u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b , t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.views, b.update_time,b.description, t.name typename,t.id typeid, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u where b.user_id = u.id and b.type_id = t.id ORDER BY b.update_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.flag,b.content, b.views,b.update_time,b.commentabled,b.appreciation, b.share_statement, u.avatar,u.nickname, tag.id tagid,tag.name tagname from t_blog b ,t_user u,t_tag tag,t_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id=b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.views,b.update_time,b.description, t.name typename,t.id typeid, t1.name tagname,t1.id tagid, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u,t_blog_tags tb,t_tag t1 where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = t1.id and t1.id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.description,b.views,b.update_time, t.id typeid,t.name typename, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and b.user_id = u.id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc
